name: release_lane
title: Release Lane
summary: Release a lane to a customer

inputSpec.name: record_link
inputSpec.label: SCGPM record DXLink
inputSpec.help: Sequencing lane dashboard record in format: project-XXX:record-YYY

inputSpec.name: project_id
inputSpec.label: Project ID
inputSpec.help: The DXid of the project to be cloned and transferred to the 'recipient'.

inputSpec.name: user_first_name
inputSpec.label: Recipient first name
inputSpec.help: First name of the user to whom the project should be transferred. Should be of the form user-xxxx; e.g., user-jdale.

inputSpec.name: user_last_name
inputSpec.label: Recipient last name
inputSpec.help: Last name of the user to whom the project should be transferred. Should be of the form user-xxxx; e.g., user-jdale.

inputSpec.name: dx_user_id
inputSpec.label: DNAnexus User ID
inputSpec.help: DNAnexus user ID of the user to whom the project should be transferred. Should be of the form user-xxxx; e.g., user-jdale.

inputSpec.name: viewers
inputSpec.label: Viewers
inputSpec.help: List of IDs of users who should receive VIEW access to the project upon transfer. Should be a comma-separated list; e.g.: 'user-bob,user-alice'

inputSpec.name: release_note
inputSpec.label: Release note
inputSpec.help: Extra notes that will be stored in the description field of the transferred project.

inputSpec.name: days
inputSpec.label: Number of sponsored days
inputSpec.help: Specifies number of days project will be sponsored by SCGPM, during which time people can retrive data without incurring fee

inputSpec.name: lims_url
inputSpec.label: LIMS URL
inputSpec.help: URL of LIMS used to update user DNAnexus ID

inputSpec.name: develop
inputSpec.label: Development
inputSpec.help: Flag to mark analysis for development purposes only
